title: Do I send a debt validation letter, dispute letters, or try to settle old medical debt in collections? Are the debts valid?
question: *I have 2 negative marks on my credit reports from 2 ER visits that, to my knowledge, are well over 7 years old. The debt totals at $1204.
answers: Get some free help from a Consumer Protection Attorney who practices in this area. Most of us will help you dispute for free and then take your case on contingency if it doesn’t work. I recommend you NOT do it yourself.

I suggest that you immediately dispute the items on your credit reports. After 7 years you are entitled to make fall off, and it is not legally valid for debt collectors to reage the debts to keep the debts on there.
